verses.name: Luke 23:5
verses.text: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.

verses.name: Luke 23:6
verses.text: When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galilean.

verses.name: Luke 23:7
verses.text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod’s jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.

verses.name: Luke 23:8
verses.text: And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long season, because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.
